page.title: 08St Thomas's church today
page.content: St Thomas's church is built of stone. Inside it there are three banks of wooden pews, an organ and an altar.There is also a font a vestry, a lectern and a pulpit.At Sunday school the children write, draw, play games and help to tidy things up.Sunday school starts at 10.30 and finishes at about 12.00.The church service on Sunday starts at 11.00 and finishes about 12.00.In a church service you sing hymns, say prayers and listen to the vicar preaching.The vicars name is Reverend Gardner who has been here nearly 3 years.The vicar who worked there before him was Reverend Weaver..
